title: Man in Germany gets 90 COVID-19 shots to sell forged passes - The Associated Press
content: Man in Germany gets 90 COVID-19 shots to sell forged passes  The Associated PressView Full Coverage on Google News
description: BERLIN (AP) â€” A 60-year-old man allegedly had himself vaccinated against COVID-19 dozens of times in Germany in order to sell forged vaccination cards with real vaccine batch numbers to people not wanting to get vaccinated themselves.
